column4: I have a question about the tray/system notifications in ubuntu 11 (gnome desktop)
Whenever i mouseover them, they disappear and reappear when i move my mouse away. Is that supposed to happen, or am i supposed to be able to click and make them disappear?
everything else works fine. Is there any way to manage how the notifications behave, or some other kind of notification manager?
what you are describing is "working as designed"
